titleStmt.title: SII 7.22: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 22. (A.R. No. 22 of 1900). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrīḥ . tribhu vaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ koṉerimelkoṇṭāṉ koṅkāṉa vīracoḻamaṇṭalattu vaṭapūvāṇiyanāṭṭu tāramaṅkalattil nalluṭaiyappar vaitta Akaram śrīlakṣmaṇaccaturvvedi maṅkalattu bha ṭṭarkaḷukku Ivvūril kāraikuḷattāl nirpāyum nilaṅkaḷ Uḷḷavaiyum ceyaperumāḷeriyālum perumārkāmiṇṭaṉeriyā
l nirpāyum kañcumalainā(yaṉā)yaṉār tevatāṉamāṉa Erikku meṟkku Uḷḷa nilamum kaṇṇantai Eriyāl nīrpāyum taṇṇāyakkaṉerikku vaṭakkuḷḷa nilamum kiḻaippoykaraiyāl nirpāyum nilamum Innāṭṭu kaḷakkuḷattil nāṉkellai yuḻppaṭṭa naṉcai puṉcai nattam Ūruṇi Uḻpaṭṭa Ivaiyum cemappaḷḷieri Uḻpaṭṭa kuḷaṅkaḷāl nirpāyum nilamu
ḷḷa Ivaiyum kārimaṅkalattil taṅkaḷ kuṭiyiruppu nattamāṉa vāstu vum vāstuśeṣa mum Āṟāvatu Āṭimāta mutal taṅkaḷukku mutalaṭaṅkabhūdā ṉa Iṟaiyiliyāka tantatu Iṉṉilaṅkaḷāl varum nelkaṭamai kācukaṭa �yam pañcupīli cantuvikkirakam vācalviṉayokam kāṇikkai kāttikaippaccai Āṭippūrappaccai piḷḷaiyārnoṉputtevai Āṉaic cā
lai kutiraippanti karuāḻttāḻvu taccuttāḻvu taṟiiṟai cekkiṟai taṭṭolitaṭṭārppāṭṭam pācippāṭṭam Oḻukku nir miṉpāṭṭam toloṭṭu Ervari Iṉavari vācalvari Āḷvari nallerutu nalppacu kāṇam Uḷppaṭṭa Ivaiyum variyilār kaṇakkilum kaḻikkumpaṭi colliviṭṭom Iṉṉāḷmutal tāṅkaḷ kaikkoṇṭu kārum pacāṉamum Orupūvum maṟuvum vampuṅ kaṭai
ypūvum kamukum teṅku vāḻai koḻuntu mañcaḷ Iñci karuṇai karumpu ceṅkaḻunīr Uṭpaṭṭa vāṉpayirum māp palā Iluppai puḷi Uḻppaṭṭa palamaraṅkaḷum pullu varaku tiṉai cāmai Iṟuṅku Āvaṇakkup parutti vaḻutilai pūcaṇi Eḷḷuk koḷḷu payaṟu Avarai tuvarai Uḻppaṭṭa puṉpayirum tāṅkaḷ cetum ceyvittu(m)ṅ koḷḷuvārākac colliviṭṭom
Ippaṭikku Ivvolai piṭipāṭāka koṇṭu Atikārakaṇakkilum nāṭṭukkaṇakkilum kaḻippittu kallilum cempilum veṭṭivittukkoṇṭu candrādityavat (c) cella Aṉupavittuppotuka Ivai tuñcalūruṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu Iyāṇṭu Āṟāvatu nāḷ muppattunālu tulyam Ivai pallavarāyar Eḻuttu
Digital edition of SII 7.22 by automatically converted to DHARMA conventions.
